channel.title: Comments on: Book review: Presentation Zen by Garr Reynolds

item.title: By: Kara
item.dc:creator: Kara
item.description:
Thank you for the great post on Garr's work. I work for Peachpit Press and thought you and your readers might be interested in knowing that he just released his first online streaming video, Presentation Zen: The Video, where he expands on the ideas presented in his book and blog. The DVD is now available for purchase as well. More info can be found here:
http://su.pr/6N0VlM
item.content:encoded:
Thank you for the great post on Garr’s work. I work for Peachpit Press and thought you and your readers might be interested in knowing that he just released his first online streaming video, Presentation Zen: The Video, where he expands on the ideas presented in his book and blog. The DVD is now available for purchase as well. More info can be found here:

http://su.pr/6N0VlM
